description.narrative: Delivery of communications materials, outreach events, engagement with print and media activities on Irish Aid activities, and management of Irish Aid website and social media platforms

Public Outreach activities will be targeted towards increasing awareness of Irish Aid’s work among new audiences in Ireland, as well as increasing understanding of global development issues, and how Irish Aid’s policies support and further the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals. This will be achieved through: 1. Organisation of and participation in public events that attract a wide audience, including the 18-25 age group, increasing knowledge and understanding of Irish Aid and global development issues; 2. Strong Irish Aid presence on social media, including through the development and dissemination of video materials, interviews with volunteers and partners to demystify aspects of Irish Aid’s work; 3. Engaging online presence through revamped Irish Aid website in responsive format optimised for mobile access, with stories and priorities clearly outlined supporting our policy documents; 4. Engagement with Irish and international media outlets on the work of Irish Aid and on global development themes.
